name: Square Pong
description:
The evolution of pong into a simple and fun arcade game.

Square pong takes the classic "pong" game to the next level: in standard mode, you will challenge 3 other players in a square field, with myriads of balls that will make the game more complicated and unpredictable.

You will also have the opportunity to break your records with the new survival mode, where you can test yourself by trying to stay alive for as long as possible.
